#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
const ll MOD=1e9+7;
ll v[100005];
ll powr(ll base,ll power,ll M)
{
        ll result=1;
        while (power>0)
        {
                if (power%2==1)
                        result = (result*base)%M;
                base = (base*base)%M;
                power/=2;
        }
        return result;
}
ll ieuler(ll x,ll mod)
{
    return powr(x,mod-2,mod);
}
ll C(ll n,ll r,ll mod)
{
    v[0]=v[1]=1;
    for(ll i=2;i<=n;i++)
    {
        v[i]=(v[i-1]*i)%MOD;
    }
    return (v[n]* ((ieuler(v[r],MOD))%MOD*(ieuler(v[n-r],MOD))%MOD ))%MOD;

}
int main()
{
    ll t,n,k;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n>>k;
        cout<<C(n,k,MOD)<<'\n';
    }
    return 0;
}
